content: the opposite side this means that each knit stitch will have a knit stitch to connect to on the opposite edge and the same goes for the purl sts 2 when you are stitching be sure to pick up both legs of each stitch 3 keep pulling the yarn tightly as you work through the seam this is to make sure the seam will be the same width as the headband and not wider weave in both tails when the seam is finished enjoy © lizzy knits llc 2023 3 written instructions row 1 rs k1 p1 2 times k2 p2 k4 p2 k2 p1 k1 p1 sl 1 wyif row 2 ws k2 p1 k1 p2 k2 p4 k2 p2 k1 p1 k1 sl 1 wyif row 3 rs k1 p1 2 times 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc 2 times p1 k1 p1 sl 1 wyif row 4 ws k2 p1 k2 p4 k2 2 times p1 k1 sl 1 wyif row 5 rs k1 p1 k1 p2 2/2 rc p2 2/2 lc p2 k1 p1 sl 1 wyif row 6 ws repeat row 4 row 7 rs k1 p1 2 times 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc 2 times p1 k1 p1 sl 1 wyif row 8 ws repeat row 2 chart © lizzy knits llc 2023 4 want to make the matching wintergreen mittens the pattern is available for download on ravelry and in my shop three birds yarn studio threebirdsyarnstudio com **copyright 2023 erin gates no part of this pattern or photos may be reproduced in any form i do not mind if you sell the finished product but please give pattern credit back to lizzy knits you can follow me on instagram @lizzy_knits and use hashtag #wintergreenmittens if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact me at lizzygates2@gmail com 5 © lizzy knits llc 2023 looking for knitting supplies check out my yarn shop threebirdsyarnstudio com we offer a wide selection of ready to ship yarn and notions from luxury brands be sure to check out all patterns and kits from lizzy knits free shipping on contiguous us orders over $100 join our rewards program to earn cash back on future orders check out our instagram page for shop updates and project photos @threebirdsyarnstudio baah yarn malabrigo we are knitters kits and more… 6 © lizzy knits llc 2023
